page.title: 16 OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school looks quite new.It is a one story building with flat roofs.We have three mobile classrooms and a swimming pool.The hall is the biggest room in the school where we have P.E. and assemblies.There are infants and juniors in our school.Altogether the school has eleven classes.Our class has twenty one second years and sixteen third years. When we come into the classroom we read and then do our work.During the day we do maths and english from the blackboard or a text book then we do spelling.Some times we do exercises from a dictionary.Sometimes we have to write a story in our English book. Sometimes we do some work on the computer.In summer we have swimming four times a week.We do P.E.and music and movement.On Wednesday we have games.
